title: CSB Notification 2026 - Walk-in interview for Project Assistant Posts
description: The Central Silk Board (CSB) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Project Assistant Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Diploma, B.E./B. Tech can apply for the CSB Notification 2026. The interested applicants can attend the walk-in interview. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee,...
